heading: Dear Streamer
context: Hey there! If you're a student or going through tough financial times, we understand that premium subscriptions might be out of reach right now. While you're using our platform, remember to support the content creators when you're able to. Once you're in a better place financially, consider subscribing to official streaming services - it helps keep the entertainment industry thriving! Keep grinding, believe in your passion, and never give up on your dreams. You've got this and finally happy streaming ❤️

heading: Introduction
context: Ez Streaming is a platform that provides metadata about Movies and TV Shows fetched from The Movie Database. Additionally, We embed trailers from YouTube and provide content using third-party providers for streams. We do not own, host, or distribute any of the content, nor do we claim ownership of it. All content remains the property of their respective owners. Moreover, we do not have control over the content hosted on third-party providers and are not responsible for their availability and copyright compliance.

heading: Copyright Compliance
context: We care about protecting everyone's creative work. We follow the DMCA and other copyright laws to make sure we do things right. If you spot anything on our platform that you think copies your work without permission, just let us know and we'll look into it right away.

heading: DMCA Notice
context: We respect the intellectual property rights of others and are committed to complying with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) and similar laws worldwide. If you believe that any content on our platform infringes your copyright, your DMCA notices should be directed to the respective content owners or streaming providers.
